texts.text: I realize I've been crying.
I get up and wipe my tears.
It may be just a dream, but the pain of saying farewell to a loved one is very real in my heart right now.
I turn to look at Yonagi.
I get up, walk to her bedside, and gently wipe away the tears pooling in the corners of her eyes.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Mm...

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Kaito?
Still half-asleep, she reaches out to me.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I'm right here.
I hold her hand in mine, and we stay like that for a while.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Hah... Hah...
My eyes snap open and I turn to the sleeping Yonagi.
It happened again.
I saw another unfamiliar vision.
Is this Yonagi's power?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: ...Kaito.
Yonagi groggily opens her eyes.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: What's wrong?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Oh...
I struggle to regulate my breathing so that she doesn't notice how shaken up I am.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: It's nothing. I was just watching you sleep, that's all.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: I see.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Are you still sleepy?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Mhm...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: You can keep sleeping.
I put the palm of my hand against her forehead and gently let it glide left and right.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: The next dream we have together will be the last.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I'll be with you soon.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: ...Okay.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Good night.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: ...Good night.
Her breathing becomes calmer, and before I know it, she's asleep.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: This will be the last dream.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Are you ready?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: ...Yeah.
I turn to face Izumo.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I know you probably won't tell me anything, but I might as well ask.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: What is it?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I think I have a hunch... about who the mastermind behind this whole elaborate setup is.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Would you hear me out?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: As long as you don't expect an answer.
I feel the corner of my mouth twitch upwards.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Going by what little I know, the only person who could put all this together is...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Me. I don't believe it could be anyone else.
Izumo gives me a level stare.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I may not have my memories...

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: But I can feel that Yonagi is important to me.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: And if this plan will serve to help her, I'm sure I would cooperate.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: But there is no third-party intervention. This plan seems able to be carried out to its completion with only the four of us in this room.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: And I believe I may be familiar with the workings of the human brain and memory formation. I wouldn't be able to keep up with what you say otherwise.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: If that's the case, and I'm right, the only person behind all this has to be me.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: What do you think?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Once you finish the last dream, everything will become clear.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: You will know, whether you want or not.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: That question is not one for me to answer at this point in time.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: ...Okay.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Let's finish that last dream.
